definitions.definition: To clear of an accusation, suspicion or criticism.

definitions.example: to vindicate a right, claim or title

definitions.definition: To maintain or defend (a cause) against opposition.
definitions.example: to vindicate the rights of labor movement in developing countries
The violent history of the suspect vindicated the use of force by the police.

definitions.definition: To lay claim to; to assert a right to; to claim.
To liberate; to set free; to deliver.
